revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR802N |revision=v1.0 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00TQEX8BO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/14/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=travel router,access point,repeater,bridge |fcc_id=TE7WR802N |ic_id=8853A-WR802N |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.55 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-AL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=550 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32BVSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.253 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=08:57:00 |oui_eth=08:57:00 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Nano Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_324.html?v=spe Product page] (CN)
The default SSID for the device is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is :the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC (upper case letters). This device is also sold as the FAST FW301RM and the Mercury MW301RM.
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr802n ''TP-LINK TL-WR802N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
===Specifications=== *[http://blog.ich8.com/post/4837 On '''ich8''' blogs] (images) • [http://blog.ich8.com/post/4850 Firmware/ART/Uboot] :"2050500387" and "1404" is silkscreened on the board. :*SoC: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533 (QCA9531 rev 1) :*Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q32 (4MB), RAM: 32MB (DDR1) :*Clocks: CPU: 550MHz, DDR: 400MHz, AHB: 200MHz, ::SPI: 20MHz, Ref: 25MHz *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/TP-Link+TL-WR802N+N300+Nano+Router+Teardown/96230 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :"2050500485" and "1603" is silkscreened on the board. :*CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533-AL3A (@560MHz) :*Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q32FVSIG (4MB) :*RAM: ''Zentel'' A3S56D40GTP-50L (32MB)
===See also=== *[[TP-LINK TL-WR802N v1.0]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR802N TE7WR802N] (04/14/2015) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR802N v2.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR802NV2 TE7WR802NV2] (01/27/2016) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR802N v4.x]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR802NV4 TE7WR802NV4] (05/17/2017) :"2050500885" and "1652" is silkscreened on the board. :*CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628N (@575MHz) 2T2R WiSoC
